Activity.Name: GetEventDescriptionForEvent
Activity.Description: Check the repository name and subtype

Activity.Name: UpdateDescriptionForEvent
Activity.Description: Set the event description as per repository name

Activity.Name: InternalEditMoveToFirst
Activity.Description: Set workflow to next step

Activity.Name: GetItemData
Activity.Description: Get record data

Activity.Name: CompareRecord
Activity.Description: Compare with previous confirmed version and generate an output document

Activity.Name: InternalEditWorkItem
Activity.Description: Create workitem for edit of the new record

Activity.Name: InternalEditMoveToNext
Activity.Description: Set workflow to next step

Activity.Name: SendTimeOutEmailForEditWorkItem
Activity.Description: Send an email stating that record add workitem has timed out

Activity.Name: GetItemData2
Activity.Description: Get record data

Activity.Name: CompareRecord2
Activity.Description: Compare with previous confirmed version and generate an output document

Activity.Name: InternalApprovalMoveToFirst
Activity.Description: Set workflow to next step

Activity.Name: InternalApprovalWorkItem
Activity.Description: Create workitem for approval of the addition of record

Activity.Name: InternalApprovalMoveToNext
Activity.Description: Set workflow to next step

Activity.Name: SendTimeOutEmailForApprovalWorkItem
Activity.Description: Send a Email stating that record add workitem has timed out

Activity.Name: TargetedRejectionMoveToFirst
Activity.Description: Set workflow to next targeted rejection step

Activity.Name: TargetedRejectionWorkItem
Activity.Description: Create workitem for targeted rejection - edit of record

Activity.Name: TargetedRejectionMoveToNext
Activity.Description: Set targeted rejection to next step

Activity.Name: SendTimeOutEmailForTargetedRejectionWorkItem
Activity.Description: Send a email stating that targeted rejection work item has timed out

Activity.Name: SetStatusToSuccess
Activity.Description: Set the event status to Success/Done

Activity.Name: SetStatusToError
Activity.Description: Set the event status to Error/Done

Activity.Name: SetStatusToTimedout
Activity.Description: Set the event status to Timedout/Done

Activity.Name: InternalApprovalResultEmail
Activity.Description: Send internal approval result email

Activity.Name: ConflictResolutionGoToFirstC
Activity.Description: Set workflow to first step for conflict resolution

Activity.Name: ConflictResolutionWIC
Activity.Description: Create workitem to resolve conflicts - traget state Confimred

Activity.Name: ConflictResolutionGoToNextC
Activity.Description: Set workflow to next step for conflict resolution

Activity.Name: CheckRecordState
Activity.Description: Check state of the record

Activity.Name: JoinExistingWorkflow
Activity.Description: Join the existing workflow

Activity.Name: UpdateRecordStateAsApproved
Activity.Description: Set the record status as confirmed

Activity.Name: UpdateRecordStateAsApprovedOR
Activity.Description: Set the record status as confirmed

Activity.Name: UpdateRecordStateAsRejected
Activity.Description: Set the record status as rejected

Activity.Name: RejectDueToWorkflowError
Activity.Description: Error occured during workflow processing

Activity.Name: PublishToEAI
Activity.Description: Publish the confirmed record to JMS for EAI to pickup

Transition.Description: If BackEndIntegration is requested then publish message to external system.

Do the merge if the workitem was created
If not done, loop
Test that all created approval workitems have been completed or someone has rejected workitem.
Do the merge if the workitem was created
If not done, loop
If accept, send catalog.
If conflict resolution is requried
Go to workitem only if participantIds exist.
Test that all created modify approval workitems have been completed or someone has rejected workitem.
Do the merge if the workitem was created
If not done, loop
If record in workflow, then Join Existing Workflow
If reject
If reject
Test that all created rejection workitems have been completed
Do the merge if the workitem was created
If not done, loop
If accept, send catalog.
